name: The Other World (Foriobob)
description:
Welcome to The Other World my first project. 

Please keep in mind that this is just the base grounds to the game, as I update it more and more features, items, weapons, armors, areas, enemies, and companions will be added.

Now for a real description of the game.

Reincarnation has given many souls who have found their purposes a body, unfortunately there's one spirit who can't find his purpose, a blank. One day while wandering the void of afterlife he stumbles into the goddess of reincarnation , and through her mercy he was reincarnated as a hallow blank shell with the potential for anything. In his new life he discovers a machine that transports him to a new world full of fantasy and magic.  Will he be able to return to his modern normal life or will he be stuck in the other world.
